<title level="1" pfs="">[Shianshi Waymaker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1806)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 48

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 46

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 43
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 18">[Shianshi Waymaker](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1806)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
<trait label="Negative" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=118" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 21</row>

**Perception** +32; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20)

**Skills**
[Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +35, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +34, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +32, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +31, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +38, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +31

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +8

**Con** +3

**Int** +9

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +4
</row>

**Items**
_+3 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [orichalcum](/Equipment.aspx?ID=378) [greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 42 

**Fort** +27 

**Ref** +35 

**Will** +29 

</row>

**HP** 330
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
death effects, [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10)

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_greatsword_ +36 ([Death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 3d12+14 slashing plus huntblade brutality

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
shadow whip +36 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 3d4+14 bludgeoning plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=27)

**Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 40, attack  +32
- **Cantrips (9th)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Produce Flame](/Spells.aspx?ID=236), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246)
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272), [Shadow Walk](/Spells.aspx?ID=275)
- **6th**
[Collective Transposition](/Spells.aspx?ID=43), [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76), [Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338)
- **7th**
[Dimensional Lock](/Spells.aspx?ID=71), [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), [True Target](/Spells.aspx?ID=346)
- **8th**
[Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Maze](/Spells.aspx?ID=187), [Unrelenting Observation](/Spells.aspx?ID=351)
- **9th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Foresight](/Spells.aspx?ID=127), [Telepathic Demand](/Spells.aspx?ID=336)

**Arcane Innate Spells** DC 40
- **4th**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [Earthbind](/Spells.aspx?ID=94)

**Rituals** DC 40

- **8th**
[Imprisonment](/Rituals.aspx?ID=13)

**Claim Trophy** <actions string="Single Action" />  Shianshi claims the soul of a creature she killed within the last minute. This works like [_bind soul_](/Spells.aspx?ID=21), except that no black sapphire is required and the soul is turned into a glowing blue light called a soul trophy. Anyone who kills Shianshi can then free the soul from any soul trophy by touching it and speaking the word for “freedom” in any language.

**Huntblade Brutality**   Shianshi's greatsword Strikes have the [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) trait and deal an additional 2d8 damage to [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10), [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16), or [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) creatures.

**Hunter's Leap** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) **Trigger** Shianshi kills a creature; **Effect** Shianshi teleports up to 30 feet and makes a greatsword Strike; on a hit, the target of the Strike is [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (frightened 3 on a critical hit).

**Whip Drain** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Requirements** Shianshi has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) with her shadow whip; **Effect** The grabbed creature must succeed at a DC 41 Fortitude save or become [drained 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=10) (drained 3 on a critical failure). If the creature is already drained, this increases its drained value instead, to a maximum of drained 4.

</column>
name: Shianshi Waymaker
